ARABIC: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيْهِ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah raised him up to Himself. Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But God raised him up (in position) and closer to Himself; and God is all-mighty and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but Allah raised him to Himself. Allah is All-Mighty, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God raised him up to Himself. God is Majestic and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact Allah raised him towards Himself; and Allah is Almighty, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But Allah raised him up unto Himself. And Allah is Ever All-Powerful, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! Allah took him up to Himself; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God raised him up to Him; God is All-mighty, All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But Allah took him up unto Himself. Allah was ever Mighty, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God raised him towards Himself. God is almighty and wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But Allah raised him unto Himself; and Allah is ever Mighty, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, Allah raised him up toward Himself, and Allah is all-mighty, all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, Allah raised him up unto Himself; and Allah is Exalted in Power, Wise;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But Allah raised him ['Iesa (Jesus)] up (with his body and soul) unto Himself (and he is in the heavens). And Allah is Ever All-Powerful, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Rather, Allah raised him up to Him. Allah is Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Rather, God raised him up to Himself. God is Mighty and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Rather, Allah raised him to Himself. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:158] Nay, God raised him up to Him. God is ever Mighty, in His kingdom, Wise, in His actions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But Allah took him up unto Himself) in heaven. (Allah was ever Mighty) in His vengeance against His enemies, (Wise) by granting triumph to his friends: He saved His Prophet and destroyed their man.
